title: For the lands owned by the State Government, (2) except Government land leased on long term for a nominal lease rent wherein remaining tenure of lease is more than 30 years
clause_text: For the lands owned by the State Government, (2) except Government land leased on long term for a nominal lease rent wherein remaining tenure of lease is more than 30 years. Transferable Development Rights (TDR) against surrender of land :-
section: Cases not eligible for Transferable Development Rights (TDR)

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: For the lands owned by the State Government, (2) except Government land leased on long term for a nominal lease rent wherein remaining tenure of lease is more than 30 years.
